lead_paragraph: Thanks to Katie Ledecky, Michael Phelps and the American women's gymnastics team, Sunday was a bounce-back night for NBC in ratings for the Rio de Janeiro Olympics.

headline.main: A Bounce-Back Night for NBC in Olympics Ratings
headline.print_headline: A Bounce-Back Night for NBC in Olympics Ratings
